Articles.Content:
Hi has anyone noticed this before? Whenever I attach an engine in the VAB or the SPH they fire constantly. It just started happening. I think it started when I added a Sub Assembly to a build and now it happens for everything! In addition to this, the engine doesnt appear in the Staging on the right. I have to wait until launch to sort out the staging. See pic!

![2hprm7m.png](http://i59.tinypic.com/2hprm7m.png)
I can't help you, but it's a known bug apparently.
It's might be due with some mods e.g do you have hot rockets installed? (I think it looks pretty cool)
No I don't have Hot Rockets. I actually did not add anything at all for a while and this just happened today. Very annoying!
Might be Tweakscale, that used to make all my RCS fire off first craft load.

> 
> Might be Tweakscale, that used to make all my RCS fire off first craft load.

You are correct. I removed TweakScale and the issue went away, however why did this only just start? Ive been using tweak scale for a while ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
It was the same with me in 0.25, same tweakscale worked fine for months! and then poof.
